content: abstract leaves cowl by deb mulder yarn fingering weight of your choice i would recommend a semisolid or solid color for the model i used yarn love s scarlett o hara 60% superwash merino wool/ 30% bamboo / 10% nylon color shown milk chocolate i used 125 yds for the cowl needles us 3 / 3 25 mm -16 circular needle us 4 / 3 5 mm -16 circular needle notions stitch marker m tapestry needle gauge 24 st/30 row = 4 in pattern blocked gauge is not critical for this project finished size 22 circumference at bottom edge 20 circumference at top edge 7 high with larger needle notes pattern is multiple of 18 stitches abbreviations p-purl k-knit k3tog-knit 3 stitches together yo- yarn over sl1-k2tog-psso slip one stitch knitwise knit 2 stitches together and pass the slipped stitch over pattern with size us 4 circular needle cast on 126 stitches using your favorite method join in the round being careful not to twist and place marker edging row row 1 knit row 2 purl row 3 knit begin leaf pattern row 1 and all odd row *p2 k 16 *repeat to end row 2 *p2 k9 yo k1 yo k3 sl1-k2tog-psso * repeat to end row 4 *p2 k10 yo k1 yo k2 sl1-k2tog-psso *repeat to end row 6 *p2 k3tog k4 yo k1 yo k3 yo k1 twice sl1-k2tog-psso *repeat to end row 8 *p2 k3tog k3 yo k1 yo k9 *repeat to end row 10 *p2 k3tog k2 yo k1 yo k10 * repeat to end row 12 *p2 k3tog k1 yo twice k3 yo k1 yo k4 sl1-k2tog-psso *repeat to end repeat row 1-12 1 more time switch to size us 3 needle and repeat row 1-12 2 more times edging row row 1 knit row 2 purl row 3 knit bind off all stitches weave in ends soak in tepid water roll gently in towel block dry to desired size the beaded lace version was done in malabrigo lace yarn in olive with size 8 beads added to the knit stitch between yarnovers one extra repeat was added so 144 stitches were cast on and the same size us 3 and us 4 were used
